content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

Identify ONE technological development that contributed to Europeans’ ability to spread religious ideas in the Americas during the period 1450–1750.

Explain ONE way that religion contributed to the process of state expansion and/or exploration in the Americas during the period 1450–1750.

Explain ONE reason why syncretic belief systems developed in the Americas during the period 1450–1750.
